title: Bengal’s folklore struggles for a place in academia
description: In an age where artificial intelligence writes poetry, algorithms curate our music playlists, and digital platforms remix traditional tunes for instant consumption, a quieter, more organic rhythm still beats in the heart of Bengal — the rhythm of its folk songs, tribal myths, and centuries-old oral traditions.

title: How this Durga Puja in Kolkata ignites debate on two sides of Artificial Intelligence
description: The Jagat Mukherjee Park puja committee said that the aim of their pandal is to highlight that AI is not just about robots or science fiction anymore.
content: The committee said that the aim of the pandal is to highlight that AI is not just about robots or science fiction anymore. “It is now part of our daily lives. It can make life easier, but if not used carefully, it can become dangerous,” said Subal Pa... [795 chars]

title: Investor Appetite for Pre-IPO AI Firms Is Pushing Valuations Sky-High
description: Investor appetite for companies linked to AI is high—and not just their stocks. Valuations for America’s hottest private artificial intelligence startups are soaring as investors clamor for exposure ahead of possible market debuts.

title: Can AI Really Be Used To Predict Outcomes When Game
description: Artificial Intelligence (AI) is reshaping industries worldwide, from healthcare to finance. Naturally, gamblers and betting enthusiasts wonder: can AI be used to predict gambling outcomes? After all, if machines can forecast stock prices or detect patterns in massive datasets, could they also crack the code behind online slots, lotteries, live casino games, or even sports […]

title: Anthropic CEO Dario Amodei warns AI could wipe out entry-level office jobs in 1-5 years
description: Anthropic CEO Dario Amodei has reiterated his warning about artificial intelligence taking over human jobs. This time, he stated that AI could replace all entry-level jobs within the next few years.
content: Anthropic CEO Dario Amodei is once again warning that artificial intelligence could decimate white-collar jobs far sooner than most expect. Speaking on BBC Radical with Amol Rajan, Amodei predicted that repetitive but variable tasks across law, consu... [3140 chars]

title: Anthropic Reaches $1.5 Billion Author Copyright Settlement
description: Anthropic PBC will pay at least $1.5 billion plus interest to resolve an authors’ copyright lawsuit over the AI company’s downloading of millions of pirated books, one of the largest settlements over artificial intelligence and intellectual property to date.

title: Tech giants pay talent millions of dollars
description: It costs billions of dollars to build artificial intelligence models, and tech companies are battling for talent to get ahead in the AI arms race.
content:
The artificial intelligence arms race is heating up, and as tech giants scramble to come out on top, they're dangling millions of dollars in front of a small talent pool of specialists in what's become known as the AI talent war.

title: AI scams surge in India: Voice cloning, deepfakes and OTP frauds leave victims helpless
description: Scammers have always relied on social engineering to deceive internet users. With artificial intelligence (AI), their tricks are becoming more sophisticated, widespread, and harder to detect. In this week’s edition of The Safe Side, we break down the most common AI scams and how to guard against them.
content:
Investigators believe fraudsters used AI-generated voice technology to mimic her relative, making the scam nearly impossible to detect. The Hyderabad cybercrime unit is now tracing the digital trail.

title: Greece Partners with OpenAI to Bring AI Tools to Public Schools
description: The Greek government is partnering with the artificial intelligence company OpenAI and the Onassis Foundation to launch a pilot program that will integrate AI tools into public school classrooms.
